attributes.action: CLOSE ALL SCHOOL DOWN URGENTLY for an appropriate amount of time amidst COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: We cannot wait until it happens to any of our children,therefore we want schools to close.We want the government to take URGENT ACTION,in addition to taking necessary actions to prevent further spread.
attributes.background: We would like the government to consider CLOSING ALL SCHOOL DOWN URGENTLY BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE, We can not let our children go to schools in this circumstances,Most of the young children have to use the public transport which again is not safe enough in situation like this,
